mapper.update: UPDATE quota_memo SET is_delete = 1, delete_time = SYSDATE() WHERE memo_id = #{memoId} AND customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quota_memo ( memo_id, customer_id, quota_id, content, organization_id, emp_id, is_delete, create_time ) VALUES ( #{dto.memoId}, #{dto.customerId}, #{dto.quataId}, #{dto.content}, #{dto.organizationId}, #{dto.createEmpId}, 0, #{dto.createTime} )
INSERT INTO quota_memo_status ( memo_status_id, customer_id, memo_id, emp_id, read_time ) VALUES ( #{dto.memoStatusId}, #{dto.customerId}, #{dto.memoId}, #{dto.empId}, #{dto.readTime} )
